title: Choosing the lesser evil option
content:
In reality, there is usually no clean-cut choice between good or evil decision. Usually each of the options comes with both negative and positive impacts.

With this principle, if you have to choose between different options, always prefer the option that has lesser negative impacts or more benefits.
